statements: DELETE FROM machine_learning_data WHERE id = 1 AND label = 0;
DELETE FROM machine_learning_data WHERE feature_1 > 0.5 AND label = 1;
DELETE FROM machine_learning_data WHERE feature_3 IS NULL;
DELETE FROM model WHERE dataset_id IN (SELECT id FROM dataset WHERE data LIKE '%example%');
DELETE FROM training_data WHERE dataset_id = 5 AND model_id = 2;
DELETE FROM training_data WHERE dataset_id = 3 AND model_id = 4;
DELETE FROM dataset WHERE id IN (SELECT dataset_id FROM training_data WHERE model_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
DELETE FROM model WHERE model_id = 3 AND model_accuracy < 0.8;
DELETE FROM training_history WHERE loss > 0.1 AND accuracy < 0.9;
